name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a detail-oriented Senior Security Engineer, I bring robust expertise in **Microsoft Defender**, **Microsoft Sentinel**, **Microsoft Purview**, and **PowerShell** to ensure comprehensive cloud security solutions. With 8 years of experience focusing on security protocols compliant with ISO 27001 and SOC2, I effectively manage **EDR** and **SIEM** systems to enhance incident response strategies. My background includes a deep understanding of **NIST** standards and **MITRE ATT&CK** framework, coupled with excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. 
In addition to security-focused roles, I possess strong development capabilities with **Python** and significant cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS**. I’ve previously led the design of healthcare and financial applications, integrating compliance standards like HIPAA and FHIR while employing **CI/CD** automation. This blend of security expertise and software development equips me to contribute effectively to your team.
